profile.name: Yehuda Katz
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building scalable systems with Ember.js and Rust @heroku
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with a passion for open-source projects, leveraging expertise in Ember.js and Rust to drive innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented scalable systems using Ember.js and Rust.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including Ember.js and Rust contributions.
Provided expert guidance to clients on software development best practices.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the growth and maintenance of open-source projects, including Ember.js and Rust.
Participated in code reviews and ensured high-quality software delivery.
